title: Drawing, "Textile Design, black and white", 1930s
medium: Brush and gouache on illustration board
description: Vertically oriented rectangles, with smaller rectangles inside. Each larger retangle divided in half vertically and each side colored in black (left) and white (right). Smaller interior rectangles are divided into vertical halves and colored in black and white also, but they are opposite of their larger counterparts, white on the left, and black on the right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design, black and white", 1930s.
1930s. Brush and gouache on illustration board. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1494.
